columns.source_column:

    SUM('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_265993911338422272]),
    ALLSELECTED('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)')
)

VAR MinCalc =
    MINX(
        FILTER(
            'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)',
            'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_265993911338422272] <> BLANK()
        ),
        'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_265993911338422272]
    )
RETURN

        MinCalc,
        VALUES('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[FISCAL_WEEK])

    VALUES('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[PUAT_Module])
)

VAR MaxFiscalWeek =
    CALCULATE(
        MAX('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[FISCAL_WEEK]),
        ALLSELECTED('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)')

RETURN

        'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Measure],

columns.source_column:
FILTER(
    'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)',
    'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Date] >= DATE(2023, 2, 24)
        && 'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Date] <= DATE(2023, 3, 17)
)
columns.description: Converted from Tableau calculation: "from Feb 24 to Mar 17"

columns.source_column:
SWITCH(
    WEEKNUM('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_265993911338422272], 2) - 'Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_1704893971550072860],
    0, "Week 1",
    1, "Week 2",
    2, "Week 3",
    3, "Week 4",
    4, "Week 5",
    5, "Week 6"
)
columns.description:
Converted from Tableau calculation: CASE DATEPART('week',[Calculation_265993911338422272]) WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860] THEN "Week 1" 
WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860]+1 THEN "Week 2" 
WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860]+2 THEN "Week 3" 
WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860]+3 THEN "Week 4" 
WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860]+4 THEN "Week 5" 
WHEN [Calculation_1704893971550072860]+5 THEN "Week 6" END

columns.source_column:

columns.source_column:

            -('Custom SQL Query (dlh_nsec.objdb) (2)'[Calculation_1704893970529177607]) > Parameter2Value,
            "Flag",

                "Normal",
                BLANK()
            )
        )
